metadata.description: Name of the the environment which is used to generate a short unique hash used in all resources.
Azure Maps account name (must be globally unique in subscription)

parameters.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('appServicePlanName'))), createObject('value', parameters('appServicePlanName')), createObject('value', format('doem-{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').webServerFarms, variables('resourceToken'))))]

parameters.virtualNetworkSubnetId: [if(not(parameters('vnetEnabled')), createObject('value', ''), createObject('value', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, if(not(empty(parameters('resourceGroupName'))), parameters('resourceGroupName'), format('doem-{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').resourcesResourceGroups, parameters('environmentName')))), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'serviceVirtualNetwork'), '2022-09-01').outputs.appSubnetID.value))]

metadata.description: Specifies the name of the virtual network.
Specifies the name of the subnet for the Service Bus private endpoint.
Specifies the name of the subnet for Function App virtual network integration.

parameters.subnetName: [if(not(parameters('vnetEnabled')), createObject('value', ''), createObject('value', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, if(not(empty(parameters('resourceGroupName'))), parameters('resourceGroupName'), format('doem-{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').resourcesResourceGroups, parameters('environmentName')))), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'serviceVirtualNetwork'), '2022-09-01').outputs.peSubnetName.value))]

metadata.description: Specifies the name of the virtual network.
Specifies the name of the subnet which contains the virtual machine.
Specifies the resource name of the Storage resource with an endpoint.

parameters.applicationInsightsName: [if(not(empty(parameters('applicationInsightsName'))), createObject('value', parameters('applicationInsightsName')), createObject('value', format('doem-{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').insightsComponents, variables('resourceToken'))))]

diagnosticSettingsName.value: [if(equals(parameters('diagnosticType'), 'Storage'), format('{0}-diagnostics', parameters('resourceName')), if(equals(parameters('diagnosticType'), 'FunctionApp'), format('{0}-diagnostics', parameters('resourceName')), format('{0}-diagnostics', parameters('resourceName'))))]

[if(equals(parameters('diagnosticType'), 'Storage'), format('{0}-diagnostics', parameters('resourceName')), if(equals(parameters('diagnosticType'), 'FunctionApp'), format('{0}-diagnostics', parameters('resourceName')), format('{0}-diagnostics', parameters('resourceName'))))]

[if(equals(parameters('diagnosticType'), 'Storage'), format('{0}-diagnostics', parameters('resourceName')), if(equals(parameters('diagnosticType'), 'FunctionApp'), format('{0}-diagnostics', parameters('resourceName')), format('{0}-diagnostics', parameters('resourceName'))))]

GEO_CACHE_CONTAINER_URI.value: [format('https://{0}.blob.{1}/{2}', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, if(not(empty(parameters('resourceGroupName'))), parameters('resourceGroupName'), format('doem-{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').resourcesResourceGroups, parameters('environmentName')))), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'storage'), '2022-09-01').outputs.name.value, environment().suffixes.storage, parameters('geoCacheContainerName'))]
